channel.title: Can some one tell me the best way to train my prayer?
channel.description: i currently have 39 prayer and i wanna get it to 43 prayer so what shud i do?

item.title: Can some one tell me the best way to train my prayer?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

mage_owner:

rofl…i quit playing rs long ago when my main mage4life919 got a perm mute…but i used his/her house to get to 52 pray, it took like 40 minutes

Perm mute is going to stop you? I still play on my lvl 90/91/92 (dunno what lvl it is now) account. I rather enjoy being muted, just go to high pop worlds, because they buy/sell everything.

item.title: Can some one tell me the best way to train my prayer?
item.dc:creator: @nathan173 nathan173

@nathan173 wrote:

[quote=“mage_owner, post:12, topic:112978”]chacha42 is his name i think…he used to open his house up with 2 guilded burners. his house is in yanille i think (havent been mem in over 2 months) all he asked was for a little donation from each person
like 100k, and you could stay there till 99 pray if you wanted[/quote]i think this chacha guy is u and your charging 100k to use it. but thanks i aincents i for telling me about shirelee

item.title: Can some one tell me the best way to train my prayer?

item.description:
@tr3v0r wrote:

Look on Rs2 Forums>Events>(Find some kind of house party or It will say gilded alter open (Or something like that))

Buy d bones, Go to the house and most likely some1 will keep liting them and you wont have to.

item.title: Can some one tell me the best way to train my prayer?
item.dc:creator: @MybBob MybBob
item.description:
@MybBob wrote:

Dragon bones + Guilded alter + Marrentil or higher burners;

Probably the most successful way, I got from 0 to 52 pray in like 35 minutes, including running to and back from bank.
